mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS total FROM sys_biz_params p WHERE BINARY p.KeyCode = #{KeyCode}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(1)/${pageSize}) AS Num FROM sys_biz_params p WHERE BINARY p.KeyCode = #{KeyCode}
SELECT * FROM sys_biz_params WHERE KeyCode = #{KeyCode} AND KeyValue = #{KeyValue}
SELECT a.Text as text,a.KeyValue as value,a.* FROM sys_biz_params a WHERE a.KeyCode = #{Key} AND a.isVisible = 1 ORDER BY OrderNum
SELECT DISTINCT BINARY p.KeyCode,p.KeyCode, p.KeyName AS name,p.KeyName FROM sys_biz_params p
SELECT count(*) as Count FROM sys_biz_params a WHERE BINARY a.KeyCode = #{KeyCode}
SELECT count(*) as Count FROM sys_biz_params a WHERE BINARY a.KeyName = #{KeyName}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_biz_params p SET p.KeyName = #{KeyName},p.KeyCode = #{KeyCode} WHERE BINARY p.KeyCode=#{oldKeyCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_biz_params WHERE BINARY KeyCode = #{KeyCode} AND BINARY KeyName = #{KeyName}
mapper.select: SELECT p.Id,p.KeyName,p.KeyCode,p.KeyValue,p.Text,p.IsEnable,p.IsVisible,p.OrderNum,p.Remark FROM sys_biz_params p WHERE BINARY p.KeyCode = #{KeyCode}
